assessment.name: The School policy for late essays does not apply to Take-home Exams. If a student is unable to submit their Take-home Exam on the due date they are required to submit an Application for Extension, including supporting documentation, no later than 1 day after the due date. A grade of zero will be applied if an extension request is not received or not approved (at the discretion of the Course Coordinator).
